deity_category: Outer Gods and Great Old Ones
edict: Create undead, feast upon carnivores that have recently feasted upon others
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Nhimbaloth (The Empty Death)](/Deities.aspx?ID=572)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 318

An especially reclusive Outer God who hunts along the shores of the River of Souls, Nhimbaloth is a shapeless entity known as the Empty Death. She preys on those who hunt souls as they travel down the river, but she devours both hunter and soul indiscriminately; those she consumes have no afterlife or potential for resurrection. They are forever gone, and forever nothing.

Nhimbaloth is said to see through [will-o’-wisps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=210), and her trace is left behind in a symmetrical pattern of seven divots along the shoreline, said to be her fingerprints. Faceless [undead](/MonsterTemplates.aspx?ID=3) haunt the places she has passed through, and plant and animal life in the area is especially hostile to the living. One place where she has particular influence is within the Mushfens of southern Varisia, where will-o’- wisp oracles sap the drive and reason from their victims and leave them wandering in a vacuous stupor through the blasted swamp.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Outer Gods and Great Old Ones](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=13)

**Edicts** Create undead, feast upon carnivores that have recently feasted upon others

**Anathema** None

**Area of Concern**
Despair, ghosts, swamps

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=374)

**Domains** [Decay](/Domains.aspx?ID=104), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Nothingness](/Domains.aspx?ID=114), [Undeath](/Domains.aspx?ID=97)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=1548)

- **2nd**
[Entangling Flora](/Spells.aspx?ID=1515)

- **5th**
[Toxic Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=1722)

</column>
name: Nhimbaloth (The Empty Death)
religious_symbol: Dripping skull with jaw stuffed with wet moss
